required.name: Azerbaijan
required.note: Visa. eVisa can be obtained through approved travel agencies

required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visa are also issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted by inviting organization/person not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: Visa via approved tour operators only

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: China
required.note: 72-hours visa free visit when in transit at Beijing, Guangzhou, Guilin, Shanghai, Chengdu, Chongqing, Dalian, Shenyang and Xi'an.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Iraq
required.note: Visa on arrival for 15 days at Erbil and Sulaymaniyah airports.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Libya
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Mozambique
required.note: Visa on arrival is no longer available to citizens of countries that host an embassy of Mozambique.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Pakistan
required.note: Visa on arrival when travelling on business valid for 30 days. Conditions apply. Visa on arrival when travelling as part of a group through a designated tour operator.

required.name: Russia
required.note: Visa on arrival (72 hours) for Kaliningrad Oblast (70 €) with appointment at least 72 hours in advance

required.name: Sierra Leone
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Turkmenistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival.

required.name: Uzbekistan
required.note: Pre-approved visa can be picked up on arrival. Simplified procedure for British citizens.

not-required.name: Armenia
not-required.note: stay up to 90 days within 180 period days

not-required.name: The Bahamas
not-required.note: 21 days - extendable up to eight months

not-required.name: Bolivia
not-required.note: 30 days - extendable up to 90 days Note: vaccination against yellow fever might be required upon arrival in some location.

not-required.name: Brazil
not-required.note: up to 90 days - extendable for further 90 days

not-required.name: Canada
not-required.note: 6 months; eTA required if arriving by air from March 15, 2016.

not-required.name: Colombia
not-required.note: up to 90 days - extendable up to 180-days stay within a one-year period

not-required.name: Vietnam
not-required.note: 15 days; effective from 1 July 2015 – 1 July 2016. At least 30 days must have passed since prior departure.

on-arrival.name: Bahrain
on-arrival.note: up to 3 months visa-on-arrival or eVisa for 14 days (extendable for another 14 days)

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days Visa-on-arrival only arriving to Dhaka Int Airport

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: eVisa 30 days - extendable for another 30 days.

on-arrival.name: Ethiopia
on-arrival.note: Visa-on-arrival only at the Addis Ababa Bole Int. Airport.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days at Dushanbe International Airport. Visa also available online for those arriving via Dushanbe or Khujand airports.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Zambia
on-arrival.note: 90 days; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zimbabwe.

on-arrival.name: Zimbabwe
on-arrival.note: 3 months; also eligible for a universal visa allowing access to Zambia.

unknown.name: Australia
unknown.note: 90 days on each visit in 12-month period if granted.

unknown.name: Myanmar
unknown.note: eVisa for 28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports Regular visa for up to three months

unknown.name: Dominican Republic
unknown.note: 30 days (USD $10 Tourist Card must be purchased upon arrival)
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Tourist Card on arrival

unknown.name: France
unknown.note: Freedom of movement (in Regions of France)

unknown.name: Gabon
unknown.note: Must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

unknown.name: Republic of Ireland
unknown.note: Freedom of movement, Common Travel Area

unknown.name: Ivory Coast
unknown.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

unknown.name: Jordan
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Kenya
unknown.note: 3 months; also visa on arrival until 1 September 2015

unknown.name: Kuwait
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Maldives
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Marshall Islands
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Palau
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Papua New Guinea
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Samoa
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Entry Permit on arrival

unknown.name: Seychelles
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Visitor's Permit on arrival

unknown.name: Solomon Islands
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free Visitor's permit on arrival

unknown.name: Sri Lanka
unknown.note: 30 days (British citizens are allowed 2 further extensions in country 1st extension 60 days normally given without additional requirements 2nd extension 90 days with interview) These are single entry extensions.

unknown.name: Suriname
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Tourist Card on arrival

unknown.name: Tonga
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: Tuvalu
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: United Arab Emirates
unknown.visa: Visa on arrival !Free visa on arrival

unknown.name: United States
unknown.note: 90 days on arrival from overseas; ESTA (valid for 2 years when issued) required if arriving by air or cruise ship.
